Miscellaneous Highlights: The Los Angeles Lakers finished 47-35 overall and 27-25 in Western Conference play last season.
The Sacramento Kings averaged 116.6 points per game while allowing opponents to score 114.8 last season.
The Los Angeles Lakers averaged 118.0 points per game last season, 55.6 in the paint, 16.3 off of turnovers and 17.0 on fast breaks.
The Kings went 46-36 overall, 10-7 in Pacific Division play and 22-19 on the road a season ago.
Others: Sacramento plays Los Angeles for a Western Conference matchup.
The Associated Press created this story using technology provided by Data Skrive and data from Sportradar.
The game is scheduled for Saturday, 10:30 p.m. EDT in Los Angeles.
